short_summary: Stream 2: Business Consulting / Change Management Stream
description: This requirement is open only to those Supply Arrangement Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS who qualified under Tier 1 for the following category:
full_summary:
### Access to Information Privacy Specialist (ATIP)

#### Notice Number and Reference

*   Notice Number: NPP E - TSPS 2.11
*   Reference Number: PW-22-01008504

#### Solicitation Details

*   Solicitation Number: NRCAN-5000068766
*   Publication Date: September 27, 2022
*   Closing Date: November 14, 2022 (expired)
*   Amended on: November 3, 2022

#### Procurement Information

*   Procurement Category: Service
*   Procurement Method: Competitive
*   Trade Agreements: This solicitation is subject to the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), and the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP).
*   Regions of Opportunity: Worldwide
*   Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region, Canada, and Ontario (except NCR)

#### Contracting Details

*   Contracting Entity Name: Natural Resources Canada
*   Contracting Entity Address: 580 Booth Street, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada K1A 0E4
*   Contracting Entity Contact: Andrea Berthelet (343-543-7092, andrea.berthelet@rncan-nrcan.gc.ca)

#### Bidder Requirements

*   This solicitation is open to Request for Proposal (RFP) holders under E60ZT-18TSPS who have qualified under Tier 1 for Stream 2: Business Consulting/Change Management Stream, Sub-Stream 2.11: Information/Records Management/Record Keeping Specialist.

#### Requirement Details

*   Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) requires services of Senior and Intermediate ATIP consultant resources on an “as-and-when required basis” under the TSPS Stream 2: Business Consulting/Change Management Stream, Sub-Stream 2.11: Information/Records Management/Record Keeping Specialist.
*   Two (2) full-time Senior ATIP consultant resources are required immediately. Additional resources at the senior or intermediate level will be required on an “as-and-when” required basis.
*   The proposed period of any resulting contract is one (1) year from contract award, plus three (3) one-year option periods to extend.
